scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "landing,app,docs" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "pnpm -C landing dev" "pnpm -C app dev" "pnpm -C docs dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C landing build && pnpm -C app build
scripts.clean: pnpm -C landing clean && pnpm -C app clean
scripts.lint: pnpm -C landing lint && pnpm -C app lint
